attributes.action: Declare, publicly, that Owen Gibbons is a nice, decent chap.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although the Prime Minister will not recall meeting Owen Gibbons (although he did, albeit very briefly, in 2001) a number of people think he is a nice chap and have said as much - Gawdbless'em.  It would be good for Owen Gibbons' self-esteem to know that the Prime Minister also thinks he's a nice, decent chap as self-esteem among the populace is good for Britain!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
